rules_text:
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard. If you do, it enters with a finality counter on it. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
{W}{B}: Keuya's Presence becomes a 3/2 Dragon creature with flying in addition to its other types.
